rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0001
rows.name: Damn... Losing Nelson's team is a real blow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0002
rows.name:
But the fact we're not the only
visitors on this rock is even worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0003
rows.name: They made it clear they want ALL humans dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0004
rows.name:
For all we know, they may be related to the forces
that destroyed Earth and followed us here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0005
rows.name: Wonderful...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'll report this to Secretary Nagi—
see if we can't bolster our defenses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0007
rows.name: Just one last thing—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0008
rows.name: What the bloody HELL is this dancing turnip doin' here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0009
rows.name: He's actually a potato.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0010
rows.name:
T-Tatsu not turnip OR potato!
For last time, Tatsu is not food![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0011
rows.name: Now, on behalf of planet Mira,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Tatsu welcome all Earth people,
and offer up friendly treaty of friendship![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0013
rows.name: ...Um, yeah. Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Anyway, we were thinking he could be
a good source of general intel about the planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0015
rows.name: Exactly how useful that'll be remains to be seen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Ohhh, don't you worry about thing!
Friends totally safe now that Tatsu is in town![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Tatsu watch over and protect friends—
especially weak, pathetic Linly, with her thin, bony wings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0018
rows.name: You mean my arms? Look who's talking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0019
rows.name: And who said anything about you coming with us?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0020
rows.name: You can stay here, you greedy, annoying little cabbage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0021
rows.name: I'm sure there's a salad here that could use you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0022
rows.name: Meh-meh?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0023
rows.name: Tatsu stay here?! F-friends would leave Tatsu...behind?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0024
rows.name: It's for the best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0025
rows.name:
You said yourself your people are endangered—
and the xenos that captured you might still be out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0026
rows.name: You'll be safest here in the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0027
rows.name: Mmm, agreed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0028
rows.name: Tatsu not agreed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0029
rows.name: Friends will want Tatsu along—friends NEED Tatsu along![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0030
rows.name: How so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0031
rows.name: What? ...Well...that... Th-that, of course![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0032
rows.name:
This planet have many helpful Nopon that Tatsu can talk to.
Other Nopon can share information for friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0033
rows.name: Hmm, that might be useful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0034
rows.name: That right, that right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0035
rows.name:
Most Nopon not like Tatsu. Nopon can be shy.
Nopon can be difficult.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0036
rows.name: Most Nopon never trust friends, or even talk to friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0037
rows.name: But Tatsu? Nopon love Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0038
rows.name:
Tatsu use smooth talk and winning personality
to get friends good info![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0039
rows.name: Hmm... The tater tot has a point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0040
rows.name: Uh-huh. More like an ulterior motive, if you ask me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0041
rows.name:
T-T-Tatsu perish the thought!
Tatsu intentions are pure, Linly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0042
rows.name: Pure as snow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0043
rows.name:
Linly intimidated by Tatsu strength and smarts,
but do not worry—Tatsu is true friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0044
rows.name:
Strength and smarts, huh?
That's really not what I'm worried about here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0045
rows.name:
All right, then it's settled. Small Fry here
will accompany you three out in the field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0046
rows.name: After all, we can use all the info we can get.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0047
rows.name: Seriously?! We have to babysit this thing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0048
rows.name: You're the ones who picked him up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0049
rows.name:
Besides, would you really want to
leave him with another team?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0050
rows.name:
Maybe not...
Unless we were invited to the meal, I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0052
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0053
rows.name:
See? Already getting along like peas and carrots.
He can be your charge, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0054
rows.name: Oh come on, Commander![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0055
rows.name: That's not funny—I've got my hands full out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0056
rows.name: This is so unfair. Back me up here, would you, Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0057
rows.name: I'm sure Elma has no objections.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0058
rows.name: Right, as you say, Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0059
rows.name:
Done and done. Welcome to BLADE, Tater.
We'll be counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0060
rows.name: Yes, sir! ...And it's "Tatsu."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0061
rows.name: Oh-ho! One thing Tatsu forgot to mention:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0062
rows.name:
Nopon are pacifists. So friends need to defend Tatsu,
keep extra super-safe in any battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0063
rows.name: Tatsu VIP diplomat, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0064
rows.name:
Aaand why am I not surprised.
So much for him "watching over and protecting" us.[ST:wait ]
